entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character in the story, who is trying to arrange his face and say something.

entities.name: cho
entities.description: A person who has just praised Harry, making it harder for him to say what he wants to say.

entities.name: michael corner
entities.description: A student who is impressed by Harry's flying skills and disagrees with his attempt to downplay his achievements.

entities.name: susan bones
entities.description: A student who mentions that nobody helped Harry get rid of the dementors this summer.

entities.name: zacharias smith
entities.description: A student who accuses Harry of trying to weasel out of showing them anything.

relationships.description: Cho has just praised Harry, making it harder for him to say what he wants to say.
Michael Corner is impressed by Harry's flying skills and disagrees with his attempt to downplay his achievements.
Susan Bones mentions that nobody helped Harry get rid of the dementors this summer.
Zacharias Smith accuses Harry of trying to weasel out of showing them anything.
